reasoning: Systemic fungal infection caused by Histoplasma capsulatum. Global incidence estimated 0.1-0.2 per 100k person-years based on endemic region prevalence and hospitalization data. Higher in endemic areas (Ohio River Valley, parts of Central/South America). Used incidence metric appropriate for acute infectious disease.
source: Deepe GS et al. (2004). Histoplasmosis. In: Freedman DO (ed). Tropical Infectious Diseases: Principles, Pathogens & Practice. 2nd ed. Philadelphia: Saunders
